page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: CHURCH:Keston Parish Church has no dedication.It stands on an ancient burial ground.It has an electoral roll of 224.The Rector is the rev.Alan Cox. RELIGIOUS CENTRE:Keston College is unique in the world.Founded in 1969 by Rev.Michael Bordeaux it is concerned with the study of religion in the U.S.S.R and Eastern Europe but hopes to expand to Vietnam,Cuba and China they have 27 fulltime staff plus volenteers. As a registered educational charity it depends on peoples donations.They have branches in the U.S.A.,Austrailia and New Zealand.They are interdenominational,non-political and purely exist for reasearch.They publish a newsletter and a list of people in prison for their beliefs.
